evidence.claim: Entexa is focused on maintaining HIPAA compliance in its healthcare management services.
References to FHIR and HL7 standards in their integration and interoperability approaches.
Supports X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange.
The company has a dedicated section addressing EHR integration and data standards compliance.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA, X12, and healthcare data exchange indicates alignment with API-first model.
